languages.text: {n}Маражай бросает ленивый взгляд на Кибеллу.{/n} "Вот видишь? Твоя смертоносная зверушка как раз собирает мясное ассорти для своих забавных ритуалов".

traits.locale_text: [draft] {n}Маражай бросает циничный взгляд на Кибеллу.{/n} "Твоя смертоносная зверушка как раз собирает мясное ассорти для своих забавных ритуалов".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai glances lazily at Kibellah.{/n} "Do you see? Your deadly little pet could use a few body parts for her amusing rituals."

{n}Marazhai glances lazily at Kibellah.{/n} "Do you see? Your deadly little pet could use a few body parts for her amusing rituals."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai starrt Kibellah müde an..{/n} "Seht Ihr? Euer tödliches kleines Haustier könnte für seine amüsanten Rituale ein paar Körperteile gebrauchen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances lazily at Kibellah.{/n} "Do you see? Your deadly little pet could use a few body parts for her amusing rituals."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai starrt Kibellah müde an..{/n} "Seht Ihr? Euer tödliches kleines Haustier könnte für seine amüsanten Rituale ein paar Körperteile gebrauchen."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai désigne Kibellah nonchalamment.{/n} « Ne le voyez-vous pas ? Votre petite esclave a cruellement besoin de nouveaux membres afin d'accomplir ses amusants rituels. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances lazily at Kibellah.{/n} "Do you see? Your deadly little pet could use a few body parts for her amusing rituals."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai désigne Kibellah nonchalamment.{/n} « Ne le voyez-vous pas ? Votre petite esclave a cruellement besoin de nouveaux membres afin d'accomplir ses amusants rituels. »

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋懒洋洋地瞥了绮贝菈一眼。{/n}“看到了吗？你那只爱杀人的小宠物需要弄些人体器官，举行她那些有趣的仪式。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances lazily at Kibellah.{/n} "Do you see? Your deadly little pet could use a few body parts for her amusing rituals."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋懒洋洋地瞥了绮贝菈一眼。{/n}“看到了吗？你那只爱杀人的小宠物需要弄些人体器官，举行她那些有趣的仪式。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lanza una mirada vaga hacia Kibellah.{/n} «¿Ves? Tu mascotita asesina te agradecería unos pedazos humanos para sus cómicos rituales».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances lazily at Kibellah.{/n} "Do you see? Your deadly little pet could use a few body parts for her amusing rituals."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lanza una mirada vaga hacia Kibellah.{/n} «¿Ves? Tu mascotita asesina te agradecería unos pedazos humanos para sus cómicos rituales».

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはのんびりとキベラを見やった。{/n}「わかるか？お前のあの凶暴なペットは、おもしろい儀式のために体の一部がいくつか必要らしい」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances lazily at Kibellah.{/n} "Do you see? Your deadly little pet could use a few body parts for her amusing rituals."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはのんびりとキベラを見やった。{/n}「わかるか？お前のあの凶暴なペットは、おもしろい儀式のために体の一部がいくつか必要らしい」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, tembelce Kibellah'ya bakıyor.{/n} "Görüyor musun? Senin ölümcül evcil hayvanın eğlenceli ayinleri için birkaç vücut parçasına ihtiyaç duyabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances lazily at Kibellah.{/n} "Do you see? Your deadly little pet could use a few body parts for her amusing rituals."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai tembelce Kibellah'ya göz atar.{/n} "Görüyor musun? Senin ölümcül evcil hayvanın eğlenceli ritüelleri için birkaç vücut parçasına ihtiyaç duyabilir."
